plot: When two young poor men save a rich man who has decided to suicide and take care of him, he learns about the other part of the society and poor people's life.
title: Ganje qarun
plot_es: When two young poor men save a rich man who has decided to suicide and take care of him, he learns about the other part of the society and poor people's life.
plot_en: When two young poor men save a rich man who has decided to suicide and take care of him, he learns about the other part of the society and poor people's life.
